abstract: William B. Harrison, the former chairman and chief executive of JPMorgan Chase, has joined the investment advisory committee of the Aurora Capital Group, a private equity firm that acquired midsize companies, Aurora said Monday. Mr. Harrison, who oversaw JP Morgan’s $58 billion merger with Bank One in 2004, will help Los Angeles-based Aurora identify potential investments and evaluate potential executives to run its portfolio companies, the firm said
